name: invite-user
description: Invite a user to Metabase. Can only be used with valid and complete email address (username + @ + domain + TLD) like 'peter.pan@neverland.com'. This will fail if the email address is incomplete or missing a part like the TLD (e.g. 'peter.pan@neverland').

email.description: A valid and complete email address (username + @ + domain + TLD) like 'peter.pan@neverland.com'. Cannot be used with incomplete emails (e.g. 'peter.pan@neverland'). If the email address is incomplete or missing a part like the TLD, ask the user for clarification before proceeding.
